text: Slices of Life (Tranches de vie) is a 1985 French comedy-sci fi film directed by François Leterrier. It is based on Gérard Lauzier's comic strip of the same name.https://www.lambiek.net/artists/l/lauzier_gerard.htm ==Plot== The film is a series of sketches ==Cast== * Laura Antonelli as Monica Belli * Michel Boujenah as Michel Lambert * Josiane Balasko as Madame Dupuis * Jean-Pierre Cassel as The Earl of Forcheville * Christian Clavier as Charles-Henri * Marie-Anne Chazel as Béatrice * Ginette Garcin as Béatrice's mother * Roland Giraud as Jean * Pierre Mondy as The President * Gérard Jugnot as Malounian * Jean-Pierre Darroussin as The journalist * Annie Grégorio as The journalist * Daniel Prévost as TV Host * Pierre Richard as Dubois * Barbara Nielsen as Marianna * Martin Lamotte as Alain * Jacques Dynam as Alex * Anémone as Cécile * Jean Rougerie as Cécile's father * Michel Galabru as The farmer * Laurence Badie as The farmer * Audrey Dana as The woman in the bed * Hubert Deschamps as The prisoner * Luis Rego as The interpreter * John Levis as The black dictator * Constantin Kotlarow as The Soviet minister * Catherine Alric as The orgy girl * Jaques Maury as The books's friends * Daniel Langlet as The scientist * Claire Magnin as The scientist * Jacques Mathou * Diego Abatantuono ==References== ==External links== * Category:1980s science fiction comedy films Category:1985 films Category:French science fiction comedy films Category:French films Category:French-language films Category:French anthology films Category:Films based on French comics Category:Films directed by François Leterrier Category:Live-action films based on comics Category:1985 comedy films
